column5: Sleded and I originally headed out for pike this morning but found the largemouth were much more co-operative. Nothing big, Sleded got the biggest at about 1.5 - 2lbs but we held them close enough to the camera that they looked decent... lol  First two were caught on scum frogs in the heavy slop near St Williams and the last two were caught on the weedbeds near Port Rowan, on buzzbaits. I think we caught a dozen in total and took pics randomly.  Only other thing of interest is I hooked a nice rock bass and a nice pike (possibly musky, more likely pike) came out of the depths and chased it all the way to the boat before taking off.  The fish weren't big and it sure wasn't easy, but anytime you get into topwater bass it's a great day on the water!          Thanks for coming out Sleded, its been way too long!
Nice to see you two hittin the water again, Rich.  I need to know, WHERE IS THE ONIONS?
Top waters alot of fun, you 2 did OK...
Nice bass. Top water bassin is a blast!
man i forgot how fun top water bass is!!! Cant wait to get out again
Great to see a report with the both of you again. I was thinking maybe family life spelled the end of the Action Angling boys.
Great report and pics Rich  Sure is fun catching them on surface....Good job you guys  Thanks for sharing Leechman
